sentences.sContent: The original flick is a stalwart of the genre, and it is the duty of everyone, not just horror fans, to watch it at least once.
sentences.sContent_eng: The original flick is a stalwart of the genre, and it is the duty of everyone, not just horror fans, to watch it at least once.
sentences.sCn: 原版电影是一种坚定的流派，不仅仅是狂热的影迷，每个人都有义务去看至少一遍。

sentences.sContent: It described the group's head as a "stalwart of the opposition faction", according to the South China Morning Post, which saw the notice on a website run by Minzu University in Beijing.
sentences.sContent_eng: It described the group's head as a "stalwart of the opposition faction", according to the South China Morning Post, which saw the notice on a website run by Minzu University in Beijing.
sentences.sCn: 根据南华早报的消息，通知描述了该组织的领导人是一个“反对派坚定的支持者”，南华早报是在北京民族大学运行的网站上看到这则通知的。

remMethod.val: stal(＝support) + wart(＝worth) → 值得依靠的 → 坚定的
